Question
========

Roll a pure die once. We define the events *A* and *B* as follows:______________. \
* *A*: the number of eyes is greater than 4,‖.
* *B*: the number of eyes is divisible by three. \ What then is the union of *A* and *B*, or *A* ∪ *B*?

Answerlist
----------

* A ∪ B = {6}
* A ∪ B = {5,6}
* A ∪ B = {3,5,6}
* A ∪ B = {1,2,3,4,5,6}

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A ∪ B = {6}: Incorrect
* A ∪ B = {5,6}: Incorrect
* A ∪ B = {3,5,6}: Correct
* A ∪ B = {1,2,3,4,5,6}: Incorrect
